abstract.t: The Centralized Conferencing Manipulation Protocol (CCMP) defined inthis document provides the mechanisms to create, change and deleteobjects related to centralized conferences, including participants,their media and their roles. The protocol relies on web services andSIP event notification as its infrastructure, but can controlconferences that use any signaling protocol to invite users. CCMP isbased on the Simple Object Access Protocol (SOAP), with the datanecessary for the interactions specified via Web Services DescriptionLanguage (WSDL).
